name: Dawn Leonard
description: Am a very honest man who would like to meet that special someone to share life’s adventures with. I have a great sense of humor and a great personality. I am also very romantic, s*xual and passionate. I have many interests including long romantic walks, holding hands and sneaking in a kiss or two – anywhere from the park to the beach, I love cooking together and enjoying a candle light dinner, I enjoy watching sports either on TV or at a stadium (my favorite teams are the real mandril ) although I like other teams as well.Other interests are dancing, going swimming in pool and beach, going the movies and karaoke, I enjoy cuddling while watching a movie or just having a drink and talking about whatever comes to my mind Am a fun loving, easy going guy, much lovely and tender at heart, am often described with word like caring, compassionate, passionate, loving, and kind hearten , am very down to earth, and not judgmental in any way, i love nature and enjoy living life to it’s fullest. am still described with words such as a Renaissance man, God fearing, a simple boy, nice, deep, goofy, romantic, creative, insightful, compassionate, helpful and resourceful. I certainly I’m Younger and wiser and also young at heart, looking for the same. A very low-maintenance person, easy going laid – back individual. I’m fun, sweet, thoughtful, and generous.
